name: IP_EDU_HANDOUT_TRACKING
description: Stores the current status for patient handouts that have been given to the patient or viewed on MyChart.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the education record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: HANDOUT_LINK
columns.description: Stores the handout link for a patient handout that has been viewed by the patient or marked as given to the patient.

columns.name: HANDOUT_NAME
columns.description: The handout name of a handout received by the patient.

columns.name: GIVEN_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user ID who marked a patient handout as given.

columns.name: GIVEN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: VIEWED_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the WPR ID for the MyChart account that viewed the patient material.

columns.name: GIVEN_DTTM
columns.description: The local instant that the handout was marked as given to the patient

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: The ETX ID for a clinical reference that has been viewed by the patient.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: FDI_DOCUMENT_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the FDI document ID for tracking FDI handouts

columns.name: FDI_CLIENT_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the client ID from the FDI patient interface for tracking FDI handouts

columns.name: VIEWED_DTTM
columns.description: The local instant that the material was most recently viewed by the patient electronically.
